pr_title: fix support for test of some pagination

timeline.message: add support for test of some pagination

timeline.bodyText: Why do you need SubqueryTableSegment ? Is the TableSegment  not enough?
timeline.author: tristaZero
tristaZero

replies.bodyText: This change is for future subquery testing，if table is subqueryTable.
replies.author: jingshanglu

timeline.bodyText: Why do you need to remove them?
timeline.author: tristaZero

replies.bodyText: Because it was changed to the test of tablereference, this function is not used。
replies.author: jingshanglu

timeline.bodyText: If you delete those assertions, where do you test the group by parsed results?
timeline.author: tristaZero

replies.bodyText: The recursive method should be used to test in subquery, subquery is not yet supported.
replies.author: jingshanglu
